name: emmet-sublime-extensions
body:
emmet-sublime-extensions ======================== Emmet-sublime extensions ## Features ### data- : @ Provides abbr. for HTML5 data-attributes. ``` div[@role=page] ``` ... wil produce ```html
``` ## Install * Make Emmet extensions directory and copy js file into them. ( please refer https://github.com/sergeche/emmet-sublime#extensions-support ) * Configure `Emmet.sublime-settings` to define extensions directory. * Restart Sublime Text. ## Thanks to * sergeche : https://github.com/sergeche/emmet-sublime/issues/354
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
